name: queerly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is strange, unusual, or not expected : The boy looked at him queerly, before edging away. For a week or two, Jo behaved so queerly that her sisters were quite bewildered.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sand is queerly beautiful in its way, and the desert has a powerful influence on you.He has made his name by writing queerly unsettling fiction.I felt myself queerly suffocated by his personality.He was unconscious and breathing queerly, so we called an ambulance.
